thread.title: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard 'won't be next James Bond' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard 'won't be next James Bond' | Daily Mail Online

author: James Dutton For Mailonline
title: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard 'won't be next James Bond' | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Frank Lampard has distanced himself from reports he could be embarking on an acting career after retiring from football. The Chelsea legend called an end to his playing days earlier this year after electing against extending his contract with New York City. And with the 38-year-old now considering his next move, it appears that Hollywood will not be his destination. Frank Lampard has distanced himself from reports that he is set to move into acting The Chelsea legend appeared on Loose Women alongside his wife Christine on Tuesday In an appearance on ITV's daytime show Loose Women, he even joked that he would not be replacing actor Daniel Craig when he eventually puts his Aston Martin int the garage for the final time. 'There's certainly rumours,' said Frank. 'Acting's not for me. I would love to get involved - I'm keeping options open, but maybe like documentary stuff, something grittier, maybe sport, 'life-y' stuff. RELATED ARTICLES
